title: What is new in technology this year? - Quora

response.answer_text: Shaping as one of the recent trends in technology this year, Distributed ledger technology (such as blockchain), Artificial intelligence (AI), Extended reality (including virtual and augmented reality), and Quantum computing, abbreviated to DARQ form one such future technology trend of 2020 that business must integrate ...

Molding as one of the ongoing patterns in innovation this year, Distributed record innovation, for example, blockchain, Artificial insight (AI), Extended reality including virtual and enlarged reality, and Quantum processing, abridged to DARQ structure one such future innovation pattern of 2020 that business must incorporate.
